item.title: K-Means Clustering Algorithm
item.description: I was inspired to implement this algorithm due to a couple of reasons. The main one being this video by Siraj Raval. The second reason being that I am interested in learning about the fundamentals of machine learning. Here is a link to the source code if you are interested. K-Means What? K-Means Clustering is considered an Unsupervised learning algorithm. More specifically it is a clustering algorithm that is able to classify n-dimensional vectors into k distinct groups.
